title: Atmel ATMEGA8 Microcontroller
extract: The abbreviation of AVR Microcontroller is “Advanced Virtual RISC” and MCU is the short term of the Microcontroller. A Microcontroller is a tiny computer on a single chip and it is also termed as a control device. ... This article gives a brief information about AVR Atmega8 microcontroller.
